County Clare is lighting up today with solid surf: 14 ft @ 16s W and light 9 mph SSE winds. Best spots include Crab Island and Doolin Point, both offering great windows early and throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 8 ft @ 14s W with moderate 15 mph S winds, still workable at various spots. Day after, conditions decline further with 4 ft @ 9s WSW and fresh 23 mph SSW winds, making it less inviting. Best: today.
